descriptionHtml:
[img]https://staticdelivery.nexusmods.com/mods/110/images/62149-0-1491041869.jpg[/img]
Illustration by : LOLICEPT (lolikyonyu) 04.01.2017

This mod is standalone. You don't need other mods.
Belko is staying at Frostfruis Inn (Roriksted)

Physical fitness is equal to None.
She is excellent in necromancy.
She is suitable for covert action.



Space Hero Gtein! Friend of Belko.
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/85312/?][img]https://staticdelivery.nexusmods.com/mods/110/images/62149-0-1501070509.jpg[/img][/url]
